actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide for emergency financing for livestock producers.
short_title: Livestock Producer and Consumer Protection Act

summary.text: Livestock Procedure and Consumer Protection Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to guarantee loans for the financing of livestock operations when the applicant's usual credit source becomes unavailable without the guarantee provided by this Act. Allows the Secretary to prescribe the terms and security for such loan guarantees. Provides that loan guarantees under this Act may not exceed $3,000,000,000 at any one time.

titles.title: Livestock Producer and Consumer Protection Act
A bill to provide for emergency financing for livestock producers.
